title: Donald Trump names former intelligence chief John Ratcliffe to CIA director
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump designated his former Director of National Intelligence John Ratcliffe, to become the director of the CIA.

title: If Trump taps Rubio for Cabinet, DeSantis to pick Senate replacement
shortDescription: If Marco Rubio is picked to be secretary of state, Gov. Ron DeSantis would pick his replacement in the U.S. Senate.

title: Trump taps Mike Huckabee to be US ambassador to Israel
shortDescription: Former Arkansas Gov. Mike Huckabee is President-elect Donald Trump's pick to be U.S. ambassador to Israel.

title: Judge pauses decision in Trump's hush money case
shortDescription: Judge Juan Merchan has decided to pause making a decision in President-elect Donald Trump's hush money case.

title: Who will be part of Trump's new administration? Key posts.
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump has already selected a chief of staff, "border czar," EPA lead and more.

title: When is Trump meeting with Biden? How to watch White House visit
shortDescription: President Joe Biden has invited Donald Trump to the White House, a tradition that Trump did not uphold in 2020. USA TODAY will stream their meeting.

title: What to expect when Trump meets with GOP leaders on Wednesday
shortDescription: The Congressional visit will be Trump's first since winning the presidential election last week.

title: Will Melania Trump have tea with Jill Biden at White House?
shortDescription: While President-elect Donald Trump confirmed his acceptance of President Joe Biden's invitation, the former first lady has been quiet.

title: Trump Cabinet picks: Here's who has been tapped for positions so far
shortDescription: Donald Trump is quickly building his administration for his second term. Several top jobs have been filled so far.

title: Trump NY felony sentencing in question as judge puts deadlines on hold
shortDescription: A New York court has put on hold the deadlines in President-elect Donald Trump's New York hush money case.

title: President-elect Trump staff picks for key roles
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's administration is taking shape as he announces his staffing picks for key roles.

title: Who's in the running for Senate majority leader?
shortDescription: Sens. John Thune, John Cornyn and Rick Scott are running for Senate majority leader.

title: Nancy Pelosi quote about impeaching Trump is fabricated | Fact check
shortDescription: A spokesperson for Pelosi said the former House speaker did not make the statement attributed to her. There is no credible evidence to the contrary.

title: Trump transition live updates: Trump makes top security, immigration picks
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump has started picking top aides while Senate Republicans prepare to elect a new leader. Keep up with live coverage.

title: How the 'diploma divide' helped deliver a Trump win
shortDescription: Democrats have long struggled to reach voters without a college education. That growing blind spot played an important role in Harris' loss.

title: Some voters can still ensure their 2024 votes are counted
shortDescription: Election officials are processing provisional ballots and absentee ballots. You may have time to cure your ballot if there was a problem with it.

title: Democrat Ruben Gallego makes Arizona history, defeats Kari Lake in US Senate race
shortDescription: Ruben Gallego's win is the fourth straight for Democrats after decades of defeats and comes in a disappointing cycle for the party elsewhere.

title: Trump reclaims White House | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Republicans have won control of the Senate. Americans voted to protect abortion rights in several states, while a ballot amendment in FL failed.

title: Watch: Robot dog guards Mar-a-Lago after Donald Trump's victory
shortDescription: Robotic dogs were added to President-elect Donald Trump's security detail following his presidential victory.

title: Trump asks Florida Rep. Mike Waltz to be national security adviser
shortDescription: Florida Rep. Mike Waltz, 50, will be tasked with helping Trump navigate tense geopolitical fights, including the Ukraine-Russia and Israel-Hamas wars.

title: Officials prepare for protests on Election Day | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: New polls show mixed results in battleground states. | The importance of college voters | Dia de Los Muertos is here. | It's all on The Excerpt.

title: What are tariffs? What to know about Trump's plan to tax imports
shortDescription: Donald Trump has long touted tariffs as a campaign promise, with targets on Mexico and China. But what do the import taxes mean for consumers?

title: States just gave an OK to these ballot measures. Here's what to know.
shortDescription: In Alaska, voters approved a minimum wage increase while Washingtonians chose to retain the state's carbon trading market.

title: Trump taps Stephen Miller as deputy chief of staff
shortDescription: Stephen Miller was the architect of Trump's hardline first-term immigration politics. He's now deputy chief of staff for Trump's second-term.

title: Trump picks Lee Zeldin to lead EPA
shortDescription: Zeldin, a staunch supporter of Trump, has just a 14% lifetime voting score from the League of Conservation Voters.

title: Claim Harris didn't win states with voter ID law is false | Fact check
shortDescription: Harris won states including Rhode Island and Colorado, both of which require voters to show proof of identification when voting in person.
